website_summaries.verdict: A large capacity, no frills unit that fits well against walls and cabinets.
pros: Durable, 13-gallon trash can with a sturdy foot pedal-opening system
flat back fits well against flat surfaces such as walls and counters
cons: Screw that fastens lid to unit is plastic and, as such, is prone to breakage

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product used. By description the only thing wrong was the box was damaged, but the product I bought came in a simplehuman product box that was damaged. The eko trash can I bought is aslo broken so the lid doesn't stay on the trash can when you set it up to use the step open feature. Very dissapointed in this purchase and will be looking for a drill and other supplies to try and fix this trash can to work. Spending almost $70 on this product for it to be broken is annoying and the fact that the eko trash can came in an other products box's makes me wonder a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: like new"; I am now out of over $100
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble stepping on the bottom piece which triggers the top lid to open up; of course there was only a 30 day money back guarantee to return the product; I called the manufacturer to see if the warranty would cover this defect and of course, since the product was still in it's original packaging, but "used, like new"; I am now out of over $100. I purposely purchased a garbage pail that was a bit expensive, figuring it would be durable and sturdy, and now I am out all of that money...all in LESS than 4 MONTHS. Thumbs down on this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately that happened within the return window
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 1 in June and returned it because the lid wold catch. Fortunately that happened within the return window. So returned it for a replacement in July and that 1 also failed to last more than a couple of months failing this week. Unfortunately, the return window on the replacement unit closed. So I spent $100+, went through the aggravation of having to return the first 1 that failed and only got about 4 months of use out of 2 of these. Save your money......
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Hodag

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed considering what I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: This trash can was about 3 mos. old when the top hinge that holds it to body broke. The lid will not open at all unless lifted off by hand. Extremely disappointed considering what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Music

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 3 months and the lid is a cheap plastic piece and already broken, I would not buy this again - you dont always get what you pay for and company will not warranty their products
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burseth

customer_reviews.title: Trash can broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than two months, I thought I was getting a good quality product because it’s not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, After just 13 months this can fell apart. The tabs on the lid broke off and the foot pedal rod will not stay in place. 30 day return policy from Amazon, ( which is their norm and they stand by it 100%) 1 year from manufacturer IF you purchased directly from them, if not they say go back to the seller. Catch 22. No more EKO products for me! $100 wasted. I am going to order a Simple Human brand with a 10 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Lid hinge (cheap, soft plastic) broke after just 2 months of normal usage. Of course, this was just outside the Amazon return window. Now we're stuck with an expensive paperweight in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this trash bin! Overpriced for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this trash bin! Overpriced for a bin that has a manufacturer's defect. The entire lid is held together by one plastic piece. This bin broke 2 x within the first 6 months of use. I was able to get a replacement the first time, which broke again very soon. The second time, both EKO and Home Essentials were no help. Although it says 1 year warranty, they blamed each other and didn't honor the warranty. Amazon is thankfully supporting me in resolving this matter now, since both companies took no responsibility. Do yourself a favor, and buy another product!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Arutyunyan

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend/poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The trash can didn't work when it arrived. The first time I stepped on the pedal to raise the lid it opened partially. I inspected the function of the arm that connects the pedal to the lid and it seems like it was poorly manufactured. Even with the pedal pressed to the floor the lid would not open fully unless I used my hand to assist it the rest of the way. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper23

customer_reviews.title: Avoid - plastic liner bags make the lid stick, and the hinge is plastic and breaks
customer_reviews.text: This can has been a GIANT headache. First off, if there is any extra plastic bag hanging around where the lid comes down on the plastic inner can, it makes the lid stick so you have to open the lid with your hands instead of the foot pedal. Second, the hinge that keeps the steel lid attached to the can is a cheap little couple of plastic dots that fit into a plastic hole on each side of the hinge. Those wore out and the lid now is sitting on the floor while I order a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E ODONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t function properly
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this when i first got it because the kid was broken. The supply sent me a new one and now the lid is not functioning properly Again. It doesn’t hold up and I’m very disappointed. Maybe the third time would Be a charm?
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lomelo

customer_reviews.title: Don't last. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered ten of these for a tattoo studio. 4 arrived broken. I should have returned them all then. It's been 4 months of use and every one is broken. The lids have either fallen off completely or the connection has broken down and they don't open properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now I am stuck with a beautiful broken kitchen trash can
customer_reviews.text: A plastic piece in the top broke on March 9, which was less than 60 days from time of purchase. The approved return time was 30 days. Now I am stuck with a beautiful broken kitchen trash can. I thought that spending over $100 would mean that the product would last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Has a small dent by the foot pedal... don't want to spend the energy sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Aburke8

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about this trash can till a month later ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this trash can till a month later the lid just broke off. We aren't rough with our trash cans...the last one I had same company, lasted 10 years. So I was a little disappointed this trash cans lid just broke one day, so soon after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Penrod

customer_reviews.title: Very poor hinge design.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor hinge design. Plastic. We returned it and got another one exactly the same. Same issue. Lid easily falls off. We put two machine screws in place to keep lid from popping off. Disappointed had it for five months. Was told we used it too much🧐
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes.. I can love a trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Can you "love" a trash can? Apparently so. Stop judging me! This looks fantastic in the kitchen, seals any smells inside, and is incredibly easy to load/unload bags (the separate inner sleeve helps a lot!) Absolutely a great find for my house!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Good value compared to others
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism for the lid is solid and shouldn't break like the last one we had, which was made of plastic. I wish the lid would stay upright on it's own for changing the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: After making a mistake buying a stainless steel garbage can with a round opening, I decided I would try this one with an oblong opening. I read the reviews and thought this looked like a good buy. I really like the garbage can and the fact that there is a "foot" at the back that goes against one's wall so the can can open freely when you push the pedal. I would recommend this to other potential buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful no dents
customer_reviews.text: This trash can arrived as promised. Beautiful no dents, worked great and packaged very well. Customer Service is wonderful as I had to return as it was to big for my home. 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Tar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, thought it was to big a first, but fits right in.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! No dings or dents, arrived quickly. Looks very nice. Love the slow close feature.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is just the size that I needed for my home and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: jennell

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift. Unfortunately, did not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Unfortunately, did not fit under counter top.
customer_reviews.author: John Scarinzi

customer_reviews.title: 50L EKO SHELL Step Can - Not worth $100
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this the first week of November in a hurry and not having read the reviews here. Shame on me. When it arrived it was dented on the back but since it was going to be in the pantry against the wall, I didn't fuss. 5 months later, the lid assembly is broken on one side. The plastic hinge sheared off. This performance is no better than the cheap 5 & Dime waste bins you can pick up for $20. Not worth $100 by far.
customer_reviews.author: Matriarch One

customer_reviews.title: In less than 2 weeks, we had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: In less than 2 weeks, we had to return the item because the lid assembly had broken, rendering the item nonfunctional. The item was replaced by Amazon, but within weeks of the replacement, the plastic lining bin began to break along the top edge, causing occasional tears in the bag. Since this was primarily cosmetic and a minor inconvenience, we decided to let it go. This week, however, the entire lid assembly snapped off, once again leaving us with a non-functioning can once again. While I understand that the item is over a year old, having paid over $100.00 for a trash can, I expected a much higher quality and a longer life.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The can lid mechanism broke beyond repair within 2.5 months. Disappointed! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Postiglione

customer_reviews.title: Had less than 4 months and its broken
customer_reviews.text: Already broken. Only had since mid January for as much as I paid for it it should've been a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: The lid broke the first week
customer_reviews.text: For almost $140, I expected to have this for a long time. The lid broke soon after I purchased it. I kept it for as long as I could stand to own a broken garbage can. I threw it out last week. So I had a very expensive, broken garbage can for a whole year. I just replaced it with a $36 garbage can that I actually love and pretty confident it wont break. (the photo was of my dog but you can clearly see my broken garbage can in view)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged order twice
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective product twice in a row. Looks great and would have really liked it if it worked and wasn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The lid came off and could not be put back on. I paid more thinking that I would receive more - a sturdy, attractive kitchen trashcan that would last years. I was wrong and I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money I spent. Walmart finally got some in at half the price, a little smaller but a better product. With this one the lid does not stay open if you open it all the way so working in the kitchen with this one is a pain. My cheaper one I can leave the lid up when I'm cooking and not have to worry about always have to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: William J Bethea

customer_reviews.title: What this does is keep the garbage can away from the wall by the desired distance
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but you do get what you pay for. It is not cheap thin stainless steal; it is well built and solid. There is an inner container that can be pulled out in case one wants to wash the can. There is also a latch on the bottom (with teeth) that extends out back, which can be adjusted to certain lengths. What this does is keep the garbage can away from the wall by the desired distance, this way it does not rub on and ruin your walls, when opening the lid. Garbage bags placed can be concealed and tucked under the removable lining, with a small amount of effort.
customer_reviews.author: BigBeard

customer_reviews.title: not the one.
customer_reviews.text: Not a great bin. Delayed lift. Has a vent in back which relaeses stench. A good home for creepers. Glad it broke so we could replace it
customer_reviews.author: Jollister

customer_reviews.title: Household Essentials EKO Stainless Steel Oblong Shell Step Waste Bin with...
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is great. The lid is closed tightly so I do not smell the odor from trash until the bag is full and we dumped it out. The pedal to open/close the lid is working fine. I can spray silicon to the mechanism to open/close the lid now and then to keep it working nicely. Very happy with this purchase. The price was right and got it delivered in time. I would recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chanh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this trash can, the issue is that the lid doesn't always respond correctly when we step on the pedal. It seems to only be an issue when the can gets a bit full. I have been keeping it less full and it has been working better. It is the second one I purchased. The first one lasted three years and for the price I felt that it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: Updating my review, lid raising mechanism broke afer 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Decent, sharp looking can. Worked great for about 4 years, then one of the plastic posts that holds the lid to it's bracket broke off and the piston that dampens the lift mechanism doesn't work. I took the mechanism completely apart to clean, inspect and repair it and found that the damper just doesn't damp any more. I live alone so it had light use. Reduced my review from 4 to 3 stars base on 4 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen trash container
customer_reviews.text: Another family member has this model and a quick demonstration proved it's value for me. Easy to service any and operate. My only problem was quickly solved. On the bottom at the back is a wire bumper to keep is spaced from the wall. The bumper digs into the floor trim. Solved by using a piece of swimming noodle for a spacer. It's a nice 13 gal can that I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: It may sound wierd, but I love this can.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was shocked that I spent so much for this waste bin, but it is well worth the money. It holds a tremendous amount of rubbish, it looks nice in my kitchen, and I love the lid. It allows time for little hands to get out of the way before it closes.
customer_reviews.author: tkflorida

customer_reviews.title: Best trashcan I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best trashcan I ever had! Previous cans did not last long - step-on mechanism broke easily. This one is sturdy and beautiful. Easy to put bag in and easier to take full bag out than any other. I hesitated at first to spend this much on a trash can but I am so glad I did. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great size  and very good quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good no complaints it's been about two months and this has been the biggest stainless steel garbage can size wise that we have found for this excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Dominick J Dimattina Jr

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look
customer_reviews.text: The can arrived quickly, LOVE the look; it seems to be bigger than my old one, which I am not complaining since we were always taking out the trash when the bag wasn't full but the old can would not hold the entire bag's capability.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Song

customer_reviews.title: easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Very large, easy to open, looks nice. It's hard to tuck bag in to.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter - pricey but she loved it and that is all that mattered.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Foster

product_meta.title: EKO 92185-1 Oblong Shell 13 Gallon Stainless Steel Step Trash Can with Lid | 50 Liter Metal Waste Bin
product_meta.description: Use the Stainless Steel Waste Can Cube 50 L for efficient hands free trash disposal in your kitchen utility room or anywhere you need to dispose of waste. This trash can measures 19.7 W x 25.6 D x 13.6 D inches and has a soft action design for quiet operation. The finish resists fingerprints and stainless steel is a high end corrosion resistant material. The can is backed by a three year manufacturers warranty and youre sure to love the style and functionality. Pedal Garbage Can Stainless Steel 50L Features Corrosion resistant stainless steel has fingerprint resistant finish. 16 W x 27.75 D x 16 D inches. Soft action step pedal for quiet operation. Hands free trash disposal using foot pedal. 50 L size is a good kitchen size waste can. Built in bag clip. Three year warranty by manufacturer
feature_bullets: 50 LITER, 13 GALLON, stainless steel waste basket with foot pedal for trash or recycling
HANDS FREE OPERATION with the convenient step foot pedal helps keep your hands clean
SOFT CLOSE LID keeps trash bin silent
FEATURES INCLUDE: removable liner, built-in bag secure ring, deodorizer receptacle, soft-close, and step foot pedal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars58 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
